title: Traditional Indian Masala Chai
description: A warming, aromatic Indian spiced tea that combines black tea with fragrant spices and milk. This comforting beverage is perfect for cold mornings or afternoon refreshment.

ingredients.notes: whole milk preferred, but any milk works

instructions: In a saucepan, bring water to a boil with crushed ginger, cardamom pods, cinnamon stick, and black peppercorns
Once boiling, add black tea leaves and reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer for 2-3 minutes
Add milk and sugar. Bring the mixture back to a gentle simmer
Continue to simmer for 2-3 minutes until the chai turns a rich caramel color
Strain the chai through a fine-mesh strainer into cups
Serve hot and enjoy your authentic masala chai
author: sahilshingate01
notes: For a stronger chai, increase the amount of tea leaves. You can also add other spices like cloves or fennel seeds for variation.
